author: Rian

Sarah, points. "Oh. Look. Some of my friends are already down here." you look ahead of her, and after a few seconds, it becomes obvious who she's talking about. Coming towards you is a group of 3 girls. They look fairly normal, walking along, laughing, but the one thing that sets them apart is their height.

All three were very tall, just some quite a bit taller than others. The 'short' one was around 90 feet, who was clothed in a midriff and a pair of booty shorts, and had a pair of flip flops. The other two were clothed more similarly to your sister. One standing 120 and the other a mind boggling 300 feet tall. You sister picks you up off the street and puts you on her shoulder.

"Hey girls! What brings you to the city?" your sister asks, crouching down and hugging the smallest girl. "Take a guess." the tallest one states, putting her hands on her hips. Your sister puts her finger on her lip, which she normally does when pretending to think. "Hmm... Oh! I bet you're out buying new dresses!" All four of the girls laugh.

----------------

Eventually you learn the girls names. The smaller one is named Jenny, the middle girl is Beth, and the tallest one is Jackie. "So... how'd you all get so tall?" You ask. This causes the girls to laugh. "Wow." your sister ask. "I brush against your head the wrong way earlier today or something?" she jokes. After she stops laughing, she explains it. "Giganta. The disorder I have? Well, they have it too as you can see." You start to mumble Giganta, and your sister hears you.

"Wow. You really are out of it today. Yeah. Giganta. Named after the DC character. It emerged in the 70s. Scientists have studied it, and have found no cause or treatment. It affects 1 in 300,000 girls, concentrated heavily in first world countries, and it normally starts showing around the time they hit puberty. Growth can be anywhere from 10 feet, to the record holder Jackie here, who's 289 feet tall... though she's a bit of a freak." Jackie giggles, "You talking bad about me down there, shrimp?" she says to your titanic sister, putting her even more massive hand on her head and patting it like she was a child. "I'm just saying you beat the previous record by over 100 feet." your sister corrects. Jackie giggles again, "Well, you know what they say; go big or go home."

"Where's Jill and them?" Your sister asks. "Oh, you mean the shorties?" Beth confirms, "They're coming. But you know how they are. Little legs can only carry them so fast." as if on que, a group of 4 more girls rounds the corner. Putting you back down on the ground, you see that these girls are also enormous... just not on the same scale. There heights are roughly 20, 25, 30 and 40 feet tall. Jackie picks up the tallest of the 'short' ones, and puts her on her shoulder. "Oh, there you are Jill," she says, "Was wondering if you got lost."

You can't help but be a bit shocked. Making your sister a giant is one thing. But so many others, thousands even, of gigantic girls is another entirely. Who knows what kind of changes you've had on the world. The true nature of your power is now becoming clearer to you.

11123.content:
Originally written by...someone. I forget who.

As you wonder what could be causing Sarah's growth, a slight movement in some nearby bushes catches your eyes. You walk towards it, finding your neighbor's cat pawing at something on the ground. The cat looks up at you and scampers away fearfully as you approach.

Cats, you thing to yourself with a shrug. What was it doing back here? Then you remember it was playing with something and turn your attention back towards the ground. Oddly, you see something that looks like an ordinary water pistol and you pick it up. There are two buttons on the top, a red one labelled "S" and a green one, labelled "G." The green one is pushed down.

You press the red one down and the green button pops up. Curiously, you push the green button down and the red one pops up. What this may be, you have no idea. Naturally, you decide to test it. You hold down the trigger and fire at a leaf on the ground and to your utter amazement, it begins to grow! You let go and the leaf stops, but you can't help notice that it is now several inches bigger in both height and width.

You push the red button and aim at the leaf again. This time, as you had guessed, it starts to shrink back down. You let go and the leaf stops shrinking and is blown away in a small breeze.

So, it appears as though you've stumbled across a Shrink/Growth Ray. The green "G" button is for growth and the red "S" is for Shrink. That cat must have been swiping at the trigger and accidentally hit Sarah, causing her to grow! Now that you've found this, you wonder where it came from.

Turning back towards your sister, she gives you an odd look. "What was it?" she asks you.

"Just a cat," you reply, but as you do, you hold down the trigger for an instant behind your back. Without any visible beam hitting her, Sarah suddenly goes from nose height to being just as tall as you, which is several inches taller than what she was.

"Yeah, I've seen the cat around our yard lately," she frowns. "She hasn't even realized she's grown! You can't resist causing her to grow even further, until you're nose height on her ! You wonder how tall you could make her, without her realizing it...

11123111.content:
You wanted to continue testing the limits of the gun, so while Sarah’s back was turned to you, you fired the gun at her again. Larger and larger she swelled, and the only indication from Sarah that she was growing was that she had to lean over further to reach the flowers. Finally you stopped when she was about the same height crouching as you were standing, which by your estimate made her about 11 feet tall. Sarah’s clothes still fit her perfectly despite her doubling in size since this morning. You decided to stop growing Sarah for now and go see what other things have changed as a result of her growth. “I’m heading inside, see you later, Sarah,” you said, and she waved goodbye over her shoulder.

As you got your first look at the house since growing Sarah, you were shocked to see that the whole building had doubled in size along with your sister. It made sense when you thought about it, because there’s no way that the new Sarah would be able to fit comfortably in a normal sized house. The changes to the house were a lot like the changes to Sarah. Everything looked completely normal, just scaled up. Exploring the huge house made you feel like a little kid again. The ceilings and walls seemed to extend forever. Beyond just the changes to the house’s structure, you noticed in your living room that the family pictures had changed to reflect Sarah’s new stature. There was one of Sarah when she was 6 years old and already taller than your parents. Another one from a few years later where she was holding you and your little sister on her shoulders. Speaking of your little sister, you were broken out of your thoughts by her poking you in the ribs.

“Whatcha doin’, bro?” Your 15 year old sister Ashley asked. She was shorter than Sarah used to be, reaching just barely above your chin’s level. She had her long blonde hair done up in a messy bun, which technically made top of her head even with your nose.

“Just looking at these pictures,” you told her. “Thinking about how crazy it is that Sarah can be so huge but so normal at the same time.”

“I know! But I think it’s really unfair that she got so tall and I’m stuck being short.” This confirmed that so far only you were aware of Sarah’s changes. Her eyes looked down and saw the device in your hands. “Ooh, what’s that you got there?” she pointed at it.

You held it up for her to get a better look. “Some toy I found in the back yard,” you lied. “I think it’s broken, cause it doesn’t light up or anything.”

“Can I see it?” she asked. You handed it over, partially because you wanted to maintain your story, and partially because you were interested in what would happen if Ashley was the one using the gun. She struck a couple poses with it. “How do I look?” she asked.

“Like a nerd,” you replied, which made her stick her tongue out at you. Dropping her arms to her side, she accidentally pressed down the button while it was aiming at her foot. Much like with Sarah in the back yard, Ashley started growing inch by inch. You watched as her eye level rose to even with your chin, your mouth, your nose, even with your eyes, then finally she was looking down at you. Throughout all this you tried to maintain a neutral expression, but it was getting increasingly difficult now that you were a head shorter than your formerly little sister. Ashley finally noticed she was holding down the button and let go of the it when she reached 7 and a half feet tall, putting your eyes level with her chest. Looking down at you from her new vantage point, Ashley’s expression was that of. . .

111231112.content:
Ashley looked down at you with wide eyes, then at the device in her hands, then back to you. “Did you see that?” she asked, incredulous. “I just grew, like two feet, in no time. Did this thing make me grow?” she gestured with her free hand to the device. You nodded, figuring you wouldn’t be able to keep up a lie when she had just experienced first hand evidence to the contrary. “Did you know that this would happen?”

That one was a little more complicated, so you began to explain. “I knew you would grow if I shot you with it, but I didn’t know if you would also notice the changes when it happened. I was testing it earlier on Sarah in the back yard, which is why she’s so huge.”

This information confused Ashley further. “Wait, so you’re saying she didn’t always use to be a giant?” Yet again, you nodded. “That doesn’t make any sense. Ever since I can remember, she’s been huge. How does that work?”

“Best I can tell, when someone gets grown with the gun, everyone except the person holding it has their memories changed so that they think that person’s always been that size,” you explained. “So with you holding the gun, you would notice the difference when you grow yourself. But I also noticed, so maybe that means that the only people who’s memories don’t change are people who have used the gun, and it doesn’t matter if they’re the ones holding it or not.” You weren’t 100% sure that that was correct, but it was the best you could come up with given what you had seen so far.

“I mean, I guess that makes sense,” Ashley said, but you could tell she didn’t understand the device any better than you did. “So if what you’re saying is right, that means that if you shoot me with this gun again, I’ll know that I’m getting bigger, but no one except for us two will think anything’s changed?” You agreed with her. She stared down at you with the puppy dog eyes she always used whenever she wanted anything from you. “Um, this might be a little weird to ask, but, uh, could you try it out on me again? I wanna see if I can tell I’m growing.” Truth be told, you were interested too, so you took the gun when she handed it to you. Both of you were extremely curious as she got into position in the center of the room.

“How big do you wanna get?” you asked her.

“Make me as tall as Sarah- no, make me taller than her” she quickly added. “I’ve always wanted to see what it’s like being the bigger sister.” You couldn’t blame her. All her life she had been short even by normal standards, and in her memories Sarah had always been the tallest person to ever live.

“Alright I’m ready if you are,” you said, which she replied to with two big thumbs up. “Firing,” you announced as you pressed the button, and watched as she began to grow again. Just like with Sarah and her before, Ashley’s clothes grew along her and the only indication that the gun was affecting her was the fact that she was getting bigger.

“This is so weird,” she said. “I don’t feel like anything is happening to me, but when I look around everything’s getting smaller. Guess you were right, bro. Once you’ve held the thing you’ll know if it’s changed anyone even when you’re not holding it.” As she said that, she passed Sarah’s height and you asked when she wanted to stop. “Keep going ‘til my head touches the ceiling, please?” she asked. You didn’t tell her that she would probably never reach it if the house changed like it did, because you wanted to leave some surprises for her.

As Ashley’s head got closer to the ceiling, the house responded by expanding to contain your growing sister. A slight look of disappointment crossed her face when she realized she wouldn’t reach her goal, but you decided to keep growing her until she was as tall as the ceilings were before she started growing. Finally you stopped when she reached a massive 18 feet tall. If you thought you felt like a little kid in the house after you grew Sarah, now you felt positively tiny. As you walked over to Ashley you realized she was now about three times your size and you were only midway up her thigh.

Unlike when you grew Sarah earlier, Ashley’s clothes and body had changed as a result of her growth. The t-shirt and capris she was wearing had become a crop top and short shorts, probably because it was expensive to make clothes big enough to fit such a massive person. Overall, Ashley looked more muscular, especially with a well-defined six pack. But the most obvious change was that her breasts had grown far faster than the rest of her body. When before she had modest B cups, now she had what would proportionally be E cups. You were trying not to stare, but it was impossible not to when they were blocking you from seeing her face.

“Oh, wow, this is better than I expected. You look so tiny!” she said as she sat down to get a better view of you. Even sitting, she was still a few feet taller than you. “I’m loving this and I wanna stay this way, but just to be sure, does that thing have a shrink button?” Instead of telling her the answer, you decided to demonstrate it by shrinking her a little bit, then growing her back again. “Good to know,” she said. “That thing really is incredible.”

“And we need to keep it a secret between the two of us,” you said. “I’m fine with sharing it, but we can’t let any other people use this gun. It would ruin the fun if more people knew about the changes. Deal?”

Ashley mimed a zipper across her mouth. “My lips are sealed. You can count on me.” With your deal complete, she stood up, stretching her arms to their fullest extent as she said. . .

The petite brunette had to be 5 foot flat, while the guy had a good half a foot on you, maybe 6’4” even. It was incredible!” She declared. “Doesn’t anything seem off about those two?” Danielle asked. You looked back over to them. Perhaps it’s not every day you see a 5-foot tall man dating a woman who was nearly 7 feet, but you weren’t one to judge. Your girlfriend was two feet taller than you. “I swapped their sizes.” Danielle stated proudly. “Really?” You asked, shocked by her statement. “Yup. She used to be tiny and he was big. Well, maybe not as big as she is now. I may have given her a few extra inches for good measure.” She smiled. Once again you looked back at the couple disbelievingly. It was hard to picture the brunette being tiny and the man being bigger than you. You were now almost 2 feet shorter than you were this morning and a foot shorter than the girl, who was about to pass your car. Stowing the gun in your pocket for the time being, you step out onto the sidewalk, just to watch the woman pass you by.

"Excuse me," you say. She turns around, expecting to see someone taller than she was. Instead, she looks down, noticing you.

"Oh my goodness," she says, a bit startled to find somebody a lot shorter than she was. She bends down in oreder to be closer to eye level to you. "Hi, little guy. Are you lost? Did you lose your mommy?"

"Great," you think to yourself. "She thinks I'm a child."

"Um...I'm sorry, but i'm actually 17 years old," you correct her. Her face immediately turns red from embarrassment.

"Oh, my gosh! I'm so sorry. I thought you were a kid! "

"It's fine. I'm mistaken for one all the time." You tell her.

"Really? Oh, that's sad, I'm Sophia, by the way." She extends her hand and you shake it.

She stands up to her full height. Your head didn't even reach her neck. "I hope you don't mind me saying this, but I think you're so cute!" Sophia tells you. "I mean, I've never seen such a small person like you before. Um...Sorry if that offends you."

"It's fine. I'm used to it by now," you reply. You take a moment to take in what she's wearing. She wore a black shirt with some pink shorts and tennis shoes. Sophia had curly black hair that came down to her shoulders and had a beautiful smile.

"So, where are you headed?" you ask her.

"Just around the block."

"Mind if I join you?"

"Sure. It would be a great start to me living here." You two start a conversation as you walk, with Sophia having to slow down in order for you to keep up with her. By the end of the trip, you had become really good friends with Sophia. You even found out she was single.

"Hey, I'm unpacking all my things in my house. Want to help me out?" she asks you.

You glance towards your house, realizing the 5'11" Jenny was still outside in her yard. Maybe you could visit her.

Then again, Sophia was being really nice to you and probably needed a lot of help with her things.

Emily laughed while flipping back her long, golden-brown hair. "Alright then stand up for a moment." You instructed.

Emily playfully stood, bouncing up and down like a little kid. You stood up to face her and you were astonished at the sight. You were looking eye to eye with your wife. The woman that you married that was only 5'3" now was level with your height of 6 feet! "Oh my goodness, you have grown. You’re my height now!" You cried out. Once again a puzzled look appeared on her face. "Honey, are you feeling alright?" Emily asked with concern. "How can I be okay? My Wife has grown about 9 inches just this morning." You freaked out. "Honey, I haven't grown at all. We have always been the same height remember?" She inquired. "But how can that be? You were just 5'3" when I woke you up this morning. Then you were stretching and suddenly you’re a lot bigger." You blurted. Emily moved closer to comfort you in her arms. She was never able to really do that before. "Sweetie, I have not been that height since grade school. Do we need to take you to see the doctor?" Emily asked.

You began to calm down, focusing on your breathing. "No. No I am okay Emily. Just having a bit of a weird morning." You reassured​ her. "Good. You had me worried there for a minute." Do you need to stretch some more?" You suggested. "Now that you mention it, I am still felling very sore this morning. Thanks honey." She replied happily. Right in front of you, Emily did her longest stretch yet. She extended her arms toward the ceiling, tensing every muscle in her body. There was no doubt this time that she was growing!

Her body was steadily reaching farther upward. Emily's outstretched fingers were getting closer to touching the ceiling. First her head and then her shoulders were raising above your eyes. You looked down at her feet to see they were inching closer toward you. Your gaze was suddenly obstructed by Emily's rapidly growing breasts. They seemed to be growing faster than the rest of her body. Emily finally let go of her stretching pose, then looked down at you. Looked down at you! She was enormous now. You had never seen a woman her size before. She giggled at the sight of you. Of how small you were compared to her and the look on your face, like you had never seen her Amazonian body before. "Uh Emily? Just one more time for clarification. How tall are you again? My head is still a little fuzzy today?" You inquired​.

Emily smiled, "I am the same 6'7" tall as the day I married you." She said as she bent down to give you a giant kiss. It was mesmerizing, incredible feeling. This new tool could come in handy. You could make her even taller. Better yet, you wondered​ if this worked on other women as well.

1122221.content:
author: HBD

You thought about seeing if other women were affected by this, but then you remembered​ the beauty before you being your wife. What else could you need, other than more of her, of course?

She excused herself to the bathroom, so you began to think of some ways to make her taller.

You grabbed a chair and start rearranging things in the kitchen on to the higher shelves in the cabinets. You finished everything to your liking and hoped that everything went according to your plan. Emily returned to see you in a contemplating pose.

"Hmmm... what's up, dear? Are you still confused? Maybe you haven't woken up all the way..." she leaned over suggestively.

You were momentarily distracted by her swaying breasts in your face, then recovered your thoughts in time to explain your quandary. "Well, I was thinking about what we should have for breakfast. It's been awhile since we had pancakes, so how does that sound?"

"Oh that sounds wonderful! So what are you waiting for?", she asked.

You gave a smirk and pointed to the shelves. "Well, SOMEONE here moved everything to where I can't reach. Too bad I don't have anyone to help me out here."

She gave a look of mock astonishment. "How dare you accuse me of doing something like this. I guess I'll make you do all the dirty work."

"Fair enough. Just don't pull a muscle.", you teased back.

"I'll try." She walked over to where the mixing bowl was, just slightly above her head. She extended her arm to retrieve it, and grew an inch. "Here you are, little one."

You gathered all the ingredients together, but then said "Can't have pancakes without the mix." You pointed up to where it was.

"Wow, you'd think that someone really tall lived here." Emily quipped as she reached for the mix. You had put it further back, so she had to stretch a little more to get to it. Another two inches.

You tossed everything in the bowl, but looked to her again and said, "Hmmm... where did that mixer go?", scratching your head with one hand and pointing directly above you with the other.

"How did you know it's there? I can't even see it", complained Emily. "Oh, men's intuition I guess. Just feel around up there."

Emily stepped behind you and stretched to reach up top. "My hand doesn't even reach that fa..." "Did you say something?" You asked.

"Hmmm? I said that my head doesn't even go up that high." She continued to search for the mixer, meanwhile you were getting a front-seat ticket to your wife growing past 7'.

She finally grabbed onto it, and handed it down to you. "Careful you don't hurt yourself."

She watched as you mixed and then realized, "Hey how are you going to cook this without a griddle? Did that magically sprout wings too?"

"Nope, got it right here", you answered as you reached under the counter to grab the iron pan in the cabinet. "Iron is too heavy to fly anyway."

"So how are you going to flip it? I know you think you're pretty macho, but even I wouldn't do it barehanded." Emily joked,

"That would be up there..." you pointed across to the other side of the room, where you had replaced a picture that was hanging there with the spatula, the nail through the hole at the tip of the handle.

"You little scamp. If you wanted to see up my skirt you could've asked.", she ruffled your hair and walked over to get it.

What she didn't know was that you originally nailed it to the wall when she was still 6' 7", so since she had grown, the nail had moved up as well, as you had hoped. You turned around eagerly to see the show.

She stood on her tip-toes and stretched as hard as she could. Sure enough, she began to grow taller. Fortunately, the spatula also began moving away. It was like some kind of surreal race, your wife chasing the spatula while standing still.

She reached 7' 6", 7' 10", 8' 1", 8' 7", and was now almost 8' 10", with the nail almost reaching the top of the 10' ceiling. You wondered what would happen next.

They seemed to be equals in standing and stature at work in this reality, both team managers albeit in different departments. What a wonder a few inches in height did for Kendra's life and career you mused.

1142121122232322.content:
You walked away from the gigantic Hannah and went to find a seat. Luckily the morning rush had already passed so there were many spaces available. You picked a comfy leather chair in the corner of room so that you could have a full view of the café. While taking a sip of your coffee, you examined the other people sitting around you to see if there were any other potential targets for growth. Sadly other than Hannah, there were only men in the shop. A couple of college students were using the free Wi-Fi to work on their laptops. You were rather frustrated that there we no other girls nearby. Perhaps you could add some more height to Hannah but you didn’t really feel like it at this time.

That is when your prayers were answered when you heard the front door chime and in walked three women. You recognized them instantly. All three girls played on the women’s volleyball team at the local university and you adored every one of them. First there was Lauren, the 6’1” buxom brunette outside hitter with green eyes and a mesmerizing smile. Next was Holly, the 6’3” blonde right side hitter with legs for days. And finally there was Chase, the 6’5” athletic redhead middle hitter and captain of the team. The trio was known commonly as ‘the wall’ as opposing teams had trouble getting the ball past them. They were one of the top lines in all of college volleyball. The team made it to the championship the past two years with the girls leading the way. In both opportunities though they lost in heartbreaking games to their archrival team from across state. That team had the twin towers of 6’10” McKenzie and 6’11” Ashley and they utterly dominated ‘The Great Wall’.

It appeared that the girls were coming in for their after-practice drinks as the rec facilities were just across the street. That is when you realized that this year’s championship game was tonight! Once again they were in the finals and facing their taller adversaries for a third year. Chase walked up to the counter first where she was dwarfed by the humongous Hannah standing a full foot and a half taller than her. The barista gladly took all three girls orders and then they walked over to a table next to you. Lauren and Holly’s knees bashed into each other’s under the table as they sat down. They both gingerly rubbed their sore knees. For a team in the championship game they didn’t seem very focused. Clearly the twin towers were in their heads playing mind games with them. “Hey good luck tonight!” You said enthusiastically. “Thanks.” The three girls answered dejectedly.

The trio were certainly not going to win with that attitude. They were basically already handing the trophy over to McKenzie and Ashley without a fight. You figured you could do something to help them out. First you focused on the shortest of the group Lauren. As she waited for her latte, she began to inch up in her seat. Lauren had already grown taller than Holly and was approaching Chase’s size. That is when you added Holly to your focus and her body crept upward as well. Lauren seemed to be getting an increase in bust size as well while Holly’s incredible legs stretched longer. Finally you added Chase into the mix and she grew too. You watched in awe, as the volleyball stars grew simultaneously right next to you. They were oblivious to the changes happening to their bodies but as they grew their attitudes began to change as well. As they neared the twin towers sizes they were more excited and confident that they could defeat their nemeses.

You didn’t want to just match their height to Ashley and McKenzie; you wanted to make them the true dominant players that lived up to their nickname of the wall. Each girl shuffled in their chairs to give each other space as they passed the 7’ mark. Your neck craned to look up at them with each passing moment. Hannah appeared at that moment with the girl’s drinks. That broke your concentration, which frustrated you. As punishment you decided to take a foot away from Hannah’s height and distribute among the three volleyball players. Hannah shrank down instantly to a height of 6’11” while the other girls each got another little boost. You gave 3” each to Lauren and Holly making them both a final height of 7’4”. Then you gave the other 6” to Chase bringing her end height to 7’8”.

The three volleyball girls were absolutely breathtaking! Hannah walked back to the counter gleefully unaware that she had just a lost foot in height. Chase, Holly, and Lauren slowly stood up displaying their full newfound height. They now looked like a team ready for the championship game as they headed out the door. This game could be the event of the century. Do you follow them to the game?
1142121122232322.title: The Volleyball Stars enter the coffee shop

There was still quite a bit of time between now and when the championship game was this evening. You thought that you could still go later on to watch the game, which would be quite the spectacle. For now, you wanted to head elsewhere and experiment with your abilities even more. You downed your drink quickly and walked by the volleyball girls on your way out the door.

It was still a beautiful sunny morning outside. There were so many places that you could go and utilize your powers. ‘But where to start?’ you thought to yourself. As you stretched your arms into the air, you felt a sharp pain in your back. Oh man, it was about time you went back to the gym. It had been ages since you had worked out and you were beginning to feel quite sluggish. That’s it! You snapped your fingers. The gym. That is where you could go next. In your head you pictured several women wearing tight-fitting yoga pants and sports bras working out on the machines, running on treadmills, and stretching in a Yoga class. It was the perfect place to try out growing some more women. The fitness element could add some interesting effects to the process as well.

Your mind was made up, that was where you were heading next. Fortunately, your gym bag was all ready to go back at home because you rarely used it. There was probably a pile of worn clothing sitting on top of your gym bag. Figuring you’d start your exercise early, you ran for home. You could not wait to get to the gym. The vision of extremely tall fit women working out got you really excited.

When you arrived at the gym, where did you start off first?

You burst into laughter and she just gives you a weird stare. "What's up with you?" She asked. "Nothing, what you said reminded me of something another one of my other friends said to me last night." you lied. Looking up at her it was obvious that she did not believe your story either. Just let me get a few things ready, you can hang out here."

As she heads up stairs to get ready, you take a look around Amanda's house. In the process of making her grow, her house seemed to change a bit as well. The ceiling was a couple of inches higher, the furniture looked to have increased in size and all of the photos displayed on the shelves had changed to reflect the new Amanda. You could tell which photos she had taken because the viewpoint was always looking down at her friends. Her family portraits had been altered as well. Amanda came down the stairs changed and ready to go. She was now wearing a brown flowing skirt that came down just past her knees and a white sleeveless blouse that showed off her amazing cleavage. The ride in Mandy's car was an interesting one. It was the same type of car that you remembered seeing before. However it was now larger to accommodate the size of its driver. You felt a bit awkward sitting in the front seat, barely able to see over the dashboard. Being with Mandy though made up for it. It was a very enjoyable conversation about work, about life, and about being tall.

Mandy pulls into the parking lot outside the theatre. She had to park a bit farther away to make sure that there was enough room for her car. "We're here!" Mandy said cheerfully. From the moment she stepped out of the vehicle, people were staring at her. It obviously did not bother her though. As you walked beside her, Mandy took your hand. You first look her large hand wrapped around yours and then up to her face. She looks down at you and winks. You were feeling both nervous and calm at the same time. Does she have feelings for you?

As you approach the front doors Mandy drops your hand and stops. You turn to look at her. "Ahem?" Mandy said crossing her arms and tapping her foot. "Oh right." you replied as you opened the door for her like a gentleman. "Thank you very much sir." Mandy said as she ducked through the door frame. The teenage boy at the ticket booth could only stare at Mandy with his mouth wide open while you tried to buy the tickets. He was not the only one amazed with her height. Everyone in the theatre was looking at her. Some attempted to play it cool like they were not staring but they couldn't do that.

You pay for the tickets and after a good thirty seconds the kid finally gives them to you. "Theatre nine." he said in a squeaky voice. Mandy loved the attention that she was getting. "Say did you want to get some snacks before the movie starts?" you asked. "Sure I would love to get some popcorn." Mandy replied. The two of you walk over to the first available line at the concessions booth. The girl behind the counter was probably around 17 or so with bleach blonde hair, a nose piercing, and a nametag saying "My name is Brooke". Like everyone else she was still staring at Mandy. "Excuse me Brooke? We would like a large popcorn with butter and two large cokes." you attempted to get her attention. There was no response from Brooke.

You figured that the only way that you would get the snacks was by giving some confidence to Brooke by making her grow. As she grows, inch by inch you see her feeling more comfortable around Mandy. She passed the 6 foot mark when she started to finally talk. Brooke looked at you, "That was a large popcorn with butter and two large cokes?" You adjust your head to continue looking her in the eyes as she grows. "Yep that is it." you replied. She stopped growing at a height of 6'10". "That will be 16.95." Brooke stated. You reach into your wallet while Brooke glides behind the counter to get the snacks. As she returns with the popcorn and to accept the cash from you, Brooke turns to Mandy again. "It is not very often I meet a woman taller than me. That is awesome!" Brooke exclaimed. "How tall are you?"

"I am 7'2"." Mandy declared. "That is really cool. At least I am not the lone tall girl in this movie theatre. Here is your change." Brooke joked as she handed you the money back. "Tell me about it." Mandy responded. The two amazons laughed. You grab the snacks urging Mandy to move on. "Enjoy the movie." Brooke said. "Oh we will Brooke. We will." Mandy answered. That made you blush once again. You wonder what will happen between the two of you.

In the row in front of you there were three teenage girls. You didn't recognize them but they sounded familiar. They around 16 or 17 years old, average height, all with bleach blonde hair. You were about to get up to say something to these girls when Mandy grabbed your arm. "Hey don't worry about them. I am used to it. At least I know I can kick those 'Barbies' asses." Mandy joked. You smirked. "Alright then. Don't worry about me. I can take care of myself too." You said. This gave you an idea. You focused on the three "Barbies" and they started to grow. The three of them stopped growing at a height of around 6'8". The tallest of the three was 6'11". Listening in on the conversation, they went on talking about how great they were. Well the "Barbies" still may think they are the hottest girls on the face of the earth, they were no longer concerned with Mandy's height. "I tell you, there must be something in the drinks at this theatre with all the tall girls around here." Mandy broke your train of thought. "Heh, maybe there is." You laughed to yourself.

All this food brought back to mind a memory you had from this new universe. It was while you were in school around the 7th or 8th grade. It was the first day back from vacation and you were ready to see your old friends at this new school. At this time most girls and boys were the same height, although s a view early blooming girls were already experiencing “the change.”

Everyone knew what “the change” was, a time in a boy or girls’ lives were they would experience puberty. During this time they would experience raging hormones that would cause rapid changes in height and weight, as well as the maturing of some other accessory. By the end of it however children would end up bigger, stronger, and more developed then they ever were before, only girls more so then boys… The average height of men being 5ft4 the average height of women being It was a fact of life just like in most insects, spiders, fish, birds of prey and certain mammals the female of the human race was much larger to the male, this difference know as sexual dimorphism.

The first day back was standard that was until lunch. At this new school there were two separate lunch lines, one for girls and one for boys. Other then this oddity you make your way through the line par usual, getting a meal of school pizza, a side salad, a carton of milk and a pudding cup. You find an empty table, and look around for some friendly faces. You peer across the open lunch room and wave to a familiar face. It belongs to an old friend from elementary school Christina. You hadn’t seen her at all over the summer; she said something about her mom having business in Hawaii and not to worry about her, but you still found yourself missing her company over your ho hum summer.

Tina as she likes to be called walked over to your table to join you, and that’s when you realize that a lot can change over the summer. Hawaii had obviously been very good to Tina. She had gotten two things very tan and very tall. Her suntanned skin perfumed with the smell of coconut lotion, and resonated with endless days of basking on the beach in the warm sunlight.

As for how lofty she now was, that was quite a surprise as well. Before the summer you had both been about the same height but now she stood at what you guessed to be a whole foot taller then you now. You knew this was the “change” that all girls went through, but to happen so fast to someone you knew so well it was a shock to experience first hand. Tina was all legs, you took note as she approached the table wearing a tank top and shorts, now having to crane your neck upwards a little more for each long stride she took. As she sat down to the table with a slight creak, and a giving you a cheery “Hi-ya!” you could already tell that your relationship with Tina was headed for a definite change.

“Hi, Tina!” you begin trying to keep your cool around this seemingly grown overnight babe. “How was your break?” you ask her. She opens her mouth as if to answer, but is cut off by a loud rumbling from her stomach. “Sorry” she says apologetically, “I’m starving.” And with that she plunged voraciously into her lunch. Watching as she does you’re taken aback by what the girls-line was being served. It wasn’t anything different then you meal, only there was a lot more of it. Instead of one slice of pizza she had three slices of pizza towering above the most of her plate. And you would hardly call her container of milk a carton, it was more like a 2-liter of milk. It definitely looked like more then you could handle at a big buffet dinner, let alone just for a lunch.

Finishing her small jungle of salad, slathered in ranch dressing, she turned her focus back to you. “Sorry” she apologized again “I was really hungry!” You wave it away as not a big deal and ask her about her summer.

“Hawaii was fan-tastic! She began ecstatically. “Mom was very busy modeling as for 8ft and up magazine, but I kept myself busy. The sun was fantastic and I got so tan.” She explained and began guzzle her milk. That’s not all you got… you think to yourself, sneaking a peek at her boobs as they bounced and almost swelled against her shirt with ever large swallow of milk Tina has. Slamming her milk jug down onto the table she let out a let out a long sigh off relief.

“So Tina…” you begin wondering how to discuss the gorilla in the room. “Maybe it’s my memory but did you grow a little over the summer?” you asked coolly knowing how ridiculous it sounded to even ask.

Tina looked bashful “Yes” she said meekly. “It was like as soon as I got there the first thing I did was eat. And all that food had to go somewhere… And so it was a cycle of sorts, I’d pig out, and then grow a little bit, and then pig even more because there was more to satisfy, and then off course I’d grow again.” You nodded as she continued after some generous bites out of her first then second pizza, feeling a side of you “wakening up” as her story went on. “So eventually I grew out of like all my clothes, but my mom wasn’t trouble at all she took me right shopping then and there. She took me shopping right then and there for a whole new wardrobe. It was so embarrassing!” she said bringing her hand up to cover her face. “She kept saying she was so proud of me, to see me budding and taking after her, etc. etc.” You stare engrossed as she finishes up her story taking liberties with the finer points in your imagination. “And so here I am.” She finished with a shrug.

“Wow!” you exclaim as she digs energetically into her immense pudding cup. “I think your summer was ten-thousand times better then mine. But it’s good to see you again” you say to her as she fills her larger then average spoon with pudding.

“Well yeah it’s really good to see you too; I think I…missed you more than I thought I would…” Tina let on, giving you a crafty glance. “One more question” she says noticing lunch is almost over, “Are you going to finish that?” and points to your pudding cup, which you chivalrously bestow to her. “Thanks! See you around…” she says enticingly towards you as you leave the table. You too hope to be seeing a lot more of Tina around that school year.

Now, who could that be? "Excuse me a moment, I will be right back." I said. Jenna sat up, giving you a chance to escape from under her giant frame. "Don't keep me waiting too long." Jenna whispered seductively. This made you even more irritated with whoever was at the door. Who could drag me away from that?

You got to the door and opened​ it swiftly. "Yeah, what do you want?" You demanded rudely. Standing there was a familiar face of a woman that you had grown earlier today. It was Megan! "Megan, I'm sorry about that. You just caught me... in the middle of something." You stated nonchalantly, attempting to avoid what was really going on. "Hey its okay, Amanda told me that you were studying with someone. Can we talk alone for a minute?" Megan asked. "Yeah sure, come on in." You responded. You guided Megan into the kitchen swiftly to avoid being seen by Jenna. Standing across from 6'6" woman, you look up at her noticing some anxiety in her eyes. "So, what is up Megan?" You asked softly.

"Well, you kind of left in a hurry from Amanda's place before I could chat with you. There is something I wanted to tell you." Megan explained. She bit her lip nervously. "Okay, what is it that you wanted to tell me?" You rushed. You were attempting to speed things up before Jenna became suspicious. "I like you!" Megan blurted. "I've always like you; I just was not sure how to say it." You were shocked by this news. Here was the girl of your dreams that you always had feelings for, and now she feels the same way about you! The only problem now is she was an hour late. The new, more confident Jenna moved a lot faster than her. "I...I...don't know what to say." You stammered. "Then don't say anything, let me." Megan whispered.

In an instant, Megan moved gracefully toward you. Not giving you a chance to react, she brought her luscious red lips to yours. You were stunned, yet not resisting at all to this Amazon’s desire. It was a great feeling. Megan really knew how to work her large tongue in your mouth. You completely surrendered to Megan's will. You ran your hands up and down her unbelievable body. The two of you were utterly lost in your senses. What is it with women that you make grow suddenly throwing themselves at you? Perhaps it is some sort of a subconscious thank you. Who knows? "WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON HERE?" A voice screamed from behind you. Your eyes went wide and your body froze with fear. Oh no, you thought, this is going to get really ugly, fast!

You turned​ around to see Jenna in the doorway with her hands angrily on her hips. She looked infuriated. "Who the hell is this? Who the hell is she?" Jenna bellowed. "Who the hell am I? I am Megan.Who the hell are you and what are you doing here?" Megan replied defiantly. Jenna stormed toward Megan, showing her how tall she actually was. This show of force intimidated Megan. "I'm Jenna, and I am a bit busy with my boyfriend right now. So why don't you get away from my man, little girl, and go home and play with your dolls." Jenna sneered. "Excuse me? I am far from little you Sasquatch. We are busy expressing our love for each other. Why don't you go back to the Empire State building and fall off." Megan retorted. This infuriated Jenna even more. Without hesitation, Jenna shoved Megan harshly. The force knocked Megan off balance, causing her to fall back into one of the kitchen chairs. The chair collapsed under the weight of the falling Megan. This sent Jenna into hysterics. The whole time you were still frozen in awe and fear of what was happening. Megan gingerly massaged her back and wiped a tear away from her eye.

"Awww, is the little baby gonna cry now?" Jenna taunted. Megan, in a blind rage, jumped back up and gave Jenna a slap across the face that echoed through the whole house. You had to get in there and stop this madness before it got too far. Jenna began to clench her fist and retract for a punch, but before she could you jumped in between. "Stop this right now. This is insane. Everyone just calm down." You said. "No, I will not calm down. You have to make a choice. You are either me or you with her. And I will make your life hell if you pick her!" Jenna exclaimed. "The same goes for me. You come with me or stay with her. But think all of the fun you could have with me." Megan stated. This was a difficult choice; you had feelings for both girls. Do you go with Megan, a girl that you had a crush on since you were young? Or do you go with Jenna, a girl that you have developed feelings for in a short time?

Out of the corner of your eye, you could see Jenna inching up.

“What? How could you choose her?” Megan exclaimed. “I have to be honest with myself Megan. I got tired of chasing after you.” You replied. Tears began to stream down Megan’s cheeks. “But…you have always wanted to be with me.” Megan sputtered. You had felt bad for leading her on, but you had to follow your heart. “That was the past. It was just a phase.” You bluntly stated. The sadness in Megan’s face was replaced with rage. “You Piece of Shit!” She screamed. Megan clenched her fist and swung to hit you right in the jaw. Megan looked like she was full of dread. “I think you should leave now. And don’t come near my boyfriend again.” Jenna ordered. Megan nodded in agreement. Jenna lightly shoved Megan’s fist back toward her, knocking her off balance. Megan scrambled quickly for the front door. She was confused as to why she would even try to take on a Giantess such as Jenna.

You turned back to Jenna. “Thanks for that.” You acknowledged. A big smile appeared on her face. “Just one of the perks of being with me.” Jenna winked. You looked over her entire enormous body. How did she even fit into your house in the first place? Behind her massive body, you noticed a giant hole where your back door used to be. Must have happened in the process of Jenna coming in. “Sorry about that. I will pay for it I swear.” Jenna apologized. “Don’t worry about it.” You winked at her. She leaned in to give you a kiss. You could certainly get used to this.

As you put on your school uniform, you couldn't stop thinking about the crazy dream you had last night. Being a giant, towering over your house, it felt so real in the dream. Sadly, you knew it could never be reality. People just don't grow that tall. Sighing, you went downstairs to go eat breakfast before school.

In your kitchen, you saw that your two sisters had gotten there before you and were already eating. "Morning," you said as you poured yourself a bowl of cereal. Your younger sister, Emma, grunted something mid-bite, while Kayla, your older sister, didn't respond or look up from her phone. Deciding it was too much effort to make conversation this early in the morning, you eat in silence.

Kayla was the first to finish, with Emma following her not long after. "Hurry up, short stuff," Kayla said. "If we don't leave soon we're going to be late." You frowned when she brought up your height. Just because she was 5'10" while you were a flat 5'0" didn't give her the right to pick on you for it all the time. For some reason, she only ever makes fun of you, when Emma wasn't much taller at 5'2". You always wished you were tall enough to look down on her the way she looked down on you, but life just hadn't worked out that way.

Emma snapped you out of your thoughts by tapping on your shoulder. "Leave it this time," she told you. "Let's just go, ok?"

When you stood up, you noticed that you were looking directly into Emma's eyes, instead of slightly up at them like you were used to. "Did you get shorter or something?" you asked her.

"Are you alright, Lindsay? We've been the same height for a while now. That might change if I have anything left in my growth spurt, but there's no way I'm getting any shorter."

"Last time I checked, I was 5 nothing," you replied.

"You're definitely 5'2", like me. No need to sell yourself short," Emma giggled at her accidental pun. "Are you coming down with something? Maybe you have amnesia?" she asked, looking concerned.

This was strange. You knew for a fact that you were shorter than Emma (much to your displeasure), but Emma was acting like you had always been two inches taller than you really were. Maybe this was somehow connected to the dream you had, and wishing yourself taller was making you taller. You didn't feel any different, however. Somehow you had to figure out what was making Emma act so strange.

"Hey shorties, I'm leaving," Kayla announced. "If you want to get to school on time I suggest you come with me."

Emma gathered her stuff and made her way out. "Are you coming Lindsay?" she asked.

You thought for a second before deciding. . .

You decided to test this theory by wishing to be taller again, focusing on being able to look Kayla in the eyes like what happened with you and Emma. It was slow, but you actually noticed that Kayla's ponytail was getting lower and lower in your perspective. At the same time, you could see the top of Emma's head for the first time since you were kids. You were actually growing! Somehow you had the power to make yourself taller, and no one ever noticed. Even your clothes grew with you. This was quite possibly the best thing that you could have imagined happening.

You kept thinking about growing taller than Kayla, and were excited to watch Kayla's head get lower and lower, until it sank beneath your view. You kept focusing on growing yourself until the top of Kayla's head only reached your chin. You estimated that you were now about 6'10", nearly 2 feet taller than when you woke up this morning! And to think, all you had to do was will it and you could grow to whatever height you wanted, no problem. You just had to show off your new height to your sisters.

"Do you two notice anything different about me?" you asked. "Like, maybe, I'm . . . taller?"

"Because you of all people needs to grow some more," Kayla scoffed.

"Yeah, some of us are normal sized, you know," Emma chimed in. Just as you suspected, they acted like you had always been this tall. But they also seemed more annoyed with you than normal, especially Emma. Probably because she was now the shortest in the family, so maybe that made her the target of Kayla's teasing instead of you. You also wondered if you had ever teased her in the past because of the height difference between you two.

You felt bad for Emma being so short now, when you had an idea. If you could make yourself grow just by thinking about it, could you do the same thing for someone else? It couldn't hurt to try, so you focused on Emma growing taller. Soon after thinking about it, you watched Emma's head slowly rise. She kept walking like nothing was happening, but you were transfixed on watching Emma get taller and taller. Not long after you started growing her, she matched Kayla's height, then surpassed it, inching her way closer and closer to yours. You kept on growing her until she was your height. Then, feeling generous, you gave her another couple inches so that she could be an even 7 feet tall.

Even though you and Emma had just gained nearly 2 feet in height, your clothes still fit just as perfectly as when you were smaller. It truly felt like the only difference between you before and after growing was that you were bigger. Otherwise, everything was the same, scaled up.

The three of you walked in silence the rest of the way to school, you and Emma taking smaller steps than normal to compensate for Kayla's much shorter legs. When you got to school, you had to duck slightly to avoid hitting your head on the doorframe. You smiled at the idea that low doors had become a serious problem for you. It was still so surreal that you could just grow people with your mind, and weirder still that doing so changed everyone's memories of the people who grew.

Inside the school, you split up with your sisters and made your way to your first class of the day.

You guessed that since Steph was now too big to fit in a normal car, your family now had the van. Checking the keys in your pocket, you saw the van's lights flash, so your hunch was right. When you were about to open the driver's door, an idea came to you, inspired by Steph complaining about how easy her meet was. "Hey Steph," you said, turning to her. "I have an idea for a race that might actually give you a challenge. She merely raised an eyebrow. "We're going to race home, you on foot and me in the van. Sound like fun?"

It didn't take long for her to reply. "You're on," she said, narrowing her eyes in the way she always did during a real competition. "Because I'm nice and want to give you a fair chance, I'll wait until you leave the parking lot to start."

"I'll make you regret that," you warned her. Starting the van, you realized the race would be harder than you thought, since you had to adjust to driving the van during the drive home. You took it slow out of the parking lot to give yourself a little time to get used to the van. As you exited the van, you saw Steph dart off in the direction of your house, your paths quickly diverging as she strayed from the roads. For the first time, you felt glad that you lived a couple miles from the high school. Hopefully Steph would start to run out of energy as you drove along, then you could overtake her down the stretch. Although you wanted to beat Steph so that she could lose at least one race in her life, you weren't willing to risk speeding to do so, making your side of the race rather uneventful until you find out who arrives first.

You turned on to your street and saw no sign of Steph. You couldn't decide if you had just won an easy victory or if Steph had beaten you by a wide margin. Just as you were pulling in the driveway, you saw Steph's massive form sprint past you and tag the house. Steph was bent over and breathing heavily. "Tie goes to the runner," she said between breaths as you climbed out of the van.

"I'll give it to you this time," you said. "How many backyards did you run through?"

"Three," she answered with a smile before standing up to her full height. "Thanks to you, I actually broke a sweat today. I'm gonna go take a shower." She turned to go inside, you following. Entering your house is when you first realized that it, too, had changed as a result of Steph's growth. The ceilings were now at least 15 feet high to accommodate her height, and the doorways had been similarly increased. The house felt bigger, not just because it was taller, but with a lot more floor space too. It almost felt like you were visiting a giant's house. You guessed you were, in a sense.

In the living room, your other little sister Maddie was lying on an enormous couch watching tv. She bounced up when she saw you. "'Hi Eliie!" she greeted before launching into a game of twenty questions. "I saw Steph was all sweaty, did she lose at the meet? Was there a girl taller than her there? Ooh! Did she trip over one of the other girls? Did the girl she trip over die?"

You laughed at how hyper she became just at the sight of you. "Steph didn't lose, there wasn't a taller girl, and she didn't trip over anyone," you explained to her audible disappointment. Now it was your turn to ask the questions. "Where are Sam and Anne?"

"Sam went with some of her friends to the mall or something, and Anne is hanging out with her boyfriend," Maddie answered. "And since they finally decided I'm a 'big girl' now, they left me here alone, so I've just been watching tv."

"Any idea when they'll be back?"

"Nope," Maddie replied as she flopped on to her back. "You wanna stay and watch tv with me?"

"Of course," you said. This was another great opportunity to grow one of your sisters and see how the world changes this time.

1523211.content:
You were itching to keep growing your sisters, so you didn't want to pass up this chance with Maddie. You settled into a spot on the end of the couch to the side of Maddie's head, so that you could grow her towards you. You didn't have an exact final height in mind, but you knew that you wanted to make her taller than Steph to see what else around the house changed. Maddie's head steadily slid towards you as she continued growing. Much like with Steph at the meet, Maddie's height wasn't the only part of her that was changing. You saw her breasts were getting a little larger, though not to the ridiculous degree that Steph's had. Instead, it was her hair that got the greatest benefit, and was beginning to extend well beyond its usual mid-back length that Maddie kept it. By the time Maddie passed what you estimated was the 9 foot mark, her hair was reaching past her waist and showed no signs of stopping. Maddie's head was about halfway to you from its starting point.

You focused to make Maddie grow faster, your impatience getting the better of you. Your were rewarded with the sight of Maddie's head quickening its pace. Her hair was starting to spill over the side of the couch and pool on the floor. You were certain that the giant Rapunzel's hair was longer than you were tall by now, and you were wondering how much longer it would get before you finished. You'd find out soon enough, in the meantime changes were beginning to take place around the house, too. First and most obvious was the ceiling getting farther away, with the walls stretching upwards after it. You could also feel the couch was getting longer as a result of your giant sister, but luckily she was still growing faster than the couch, so you weren't locked in an endless cycle of Maddie's height increasing and the couch lengthening to meet it. It was an odd sensation for you to feel the couch expand around you while you were sitting still on it, although it wasn't exactly uncomfortable.

After only a few minutes of growing that felt much longer than it was, Maddie's gigantic head came to a rest in your lap. Or at least, she was resting it as comfortably as she could, considering her head was now more than twice as long as you were wide. As for the rest of her, you guessed that she was at least twice as tall as Steph, which made Maddie somewhere between four and five times your height. One thing that you hadn't planned for how truly large her head was how heavy her head was going to be. Although you could tell Maddie was trying to keep as much weight off of you as possible, you were effectively trapped on the couch until she decided to move.

On the bright side, Maddie seemed to be having a good time hanging out with you, and the tv on the other wall had become larger than the wall was before you grew Steph and Maddie. You figured that your family must have been rich now to be able to afford the oversized house and everything in it. It wasn't difficult to imagine why, since all the publicity from Steph and Maddie being the two largest people in existence would provide a substantial income just from the sheer novelty of their size.

You were admiring Maddie's hair, wondering how long it was from end to end when Steph entered the room, finished with her shower. "You two mind if I join?" she asked.

"You're gonna have to sit on the floor," Maddie answered. "This couch is reserved for special Maddie and Ellie bonding time."

"Oh, heavens no," Steph said dramatically. "I'd hate to ruin your super special bonding time." She leaned against the arm of the couch to the side of you, stretching her legs as far as they could go. Of course, that action tempted you to grow her even more, but now you were starting to get worried about overdoing it. On the other hand, you figured you could always undo it and bring them down to more reasonable heights, but that didn't sound like as much fun to you.
1523211.title: Tv time with a massive Maddie

15232112.content:
As much as you wanted to grow Steph right now, another idea that you liked even better suddenly came to you: waiting for Sam and Anne to come home and grow them at the same time. Since you had already given your younger sisters a boost, it only felt fair that you give the older ones a chance. Now the hard part for you was waiting for them to come home, since you were impatient to see how they were affected by your power. Not that you didn't enjoy spending time with Maddie and Steph, but watching tv with them was a lot less interesting to you than growing them to outrageous heights. Right now, Maddie had one of those wedding dress shows on, which wasn't your cup of tea, but you could tolerate it. Steph, on the other hand, was even less into the show than you were.

"Maddie, can we watch something other than this mushy stuff?" she asked. "I feel like I'm gonna be sick." She put her hands up to her mouth and made a mock vomiting noise to make her point.

"You're so disgusting!" Maddie replied as she got up from your lap. "If you want to change the channel so badly, you'll have to get the remote from me!" She grabbed the remote and rose to her full height, giving you your first chance to really see Maddie after you grew her, and couldn't help but be in awe. Steph only came up to the middle of her thighs, and she made you look like a little kid when standing side by side. If you were standing in front of Maddie, you wouldn't even come up to her knees. More impressively, Maddie's curtains of hair reached all the way to the floor. If it were anyone else at her size, you'd probably be afraid of her, but since you knew that she was one of the sweetest people in the world, you didn't have anything to worry about.

Maddie was holding the remote above her head, and Steph was jumping at her trying to get it, but coming up well short. "You're gonna have to jump higher than that, shorty," Maddie teased.

"I'm not short," Steph said as she backed up to get a running start. Even then, her reach only came up to Maddie's shoulders.

"You're right," Maddie considered for a second. "You're tiny, 'big' sister."

"I'm 11 feet tall!"

"And I'm 24 feet tall. So from up here, you're tiny."

Steph turned to you. "Ellie, Maddie's calling me tiny again!" By the tone of her voice you knew she was joking. Apparently this was something that they ribbed each other about constantly. "Help me get the remote from the big, mean giant."

You put your hands up. "I'm not getting in the middle of this," you said. "I don't wanna risk accidentally getting stepped on by her. But I'm pretty sure Maddie is still really ticklish."

Steph's eyes lit up and Maddie's widened when you said that. With a wicked grin she dove for Maddie's feet and mercilessly began tickling them. Despite Maddie's cries to stop and that tickling wasn't fair, Steph kept at it until the taller girl lost her balance, falling backwards and hitting the ground with a house-shaking crash. Steph quickly disengaged and picked up the remote from where Maddie dropped it, celebrating her triumph. She didn't have long to celebrate before Maddie rolled on to her stomach and began to stand. Steph took off at a run, but Maddie was too fast for her, grabbing the smaller giant around the midsection and hoisting her into the air, kicking and laughing.

"Say you're sorry for tickling me," Maddie demanded through a smile.

"Never! You can't make me!" Steph replied, defiant.

"What are you two doing?" a new voice asked. "It felt like an earthquake was going on." Looking over you saw it belonged to your oldest sister Sam. From your perspective high on the couch and the fact that the house was designed with Steph and Maddie in mind, she looked like a doll compared to her little sisters.

"Oh, y'know, just fighting over the remote," Maddie said. "Normal sister stuff really."

"Beats what's on tv," Sam said, glancing at it. "I'd ask who's winning, but it looks pretty obvious."

"I've got her right where I want her!" Steph exclaimed. She tried wriggling free, but failed to escape Maddie's iron grip.

Sam laughed. "There's no escaping once she gets her hands on you, I thought you knew that by now." She turned to you. "How've you been, Ellie?"

"Just enjoying the spectacle. I bet we could make some good money if we charged pay-per-view for this," you answered.

"It'd need to be a more fair fight before we can do that," Sam said, climbing up on the couch to sit by you. Until she was right there with you, you'd forgotten that you grew her in the morning, and even though she was many feet shorter than the other two, she still made an imposing figure next to you. Soon she was going to be an even more imposing figure, though she didn't realize it. Now that she was here, maybe you could grow her to be more on par with Steph and Maddie, but you did resolve to wait until Anne was home too. You didn't know how long that would take, and to a degree the suspense was bothering you.

From the moment that Riley and Teresa left all that you could think about was your date with Riley. You were absolutely entranced with the newly 7’ blonde that was unaware of her new tallness. Immediately after their departure, you were on the phone making a reservation for two at the newest little French bistro downtown. Luckily there was one table still available. With so much anticipation you thought that the next night would never come. Surprisingly it arrived much sooner than you expected. You spent most of the day getting ready for the evening; picking out the right outfit, making sure you were clean and properly groomed. Teresa would walk by your door now and then to tease you but you paid little attention to her. In the end, you chose your nicest black pants with suspenders, a light colored plaid shirt, and a bow tie. What? Bow ties are cool.

As the hour approached you finished up and headed out the door to pick up Riley. You got into your car and adjusted the passenger seat back as far as you could. Hopefully, Riley wouldn’t feel too cramped in your vehicle. Although you could barely contain your excitement you did your best to adhere to the rules of the road, only missing one stop sign in the process. Luckily no one else was at the intersection. In a short ten minutes, you pulled into the all too familiar driveway of Riley’s place. Her old ’94 Plymouth Neon had disappeared. In its place was a much larger Chevy Tahoe. You figured there was no way she would be able to fit into that neon now. You nervously/excitedly walked toward her front door with a rose in your hand. Your hand trembled as you raised it up and knocked on the wooden door.

After what felt like an eternity but in reality was only a few seconds the door opened. You smiled as the door crept open, revealing your date standing in the entryway. Your jaw literally dropped, as your eyes and your brain comprehended the sight in front of you. Riley stood majestically, wearing an astonishing little black mini dress that complimented every part of her incredible body. The top of her head looked dangerously close to the top of the door frame. You admired her stunning long legs, her curvaceous hips and ass, voluptuous breasts, and captivating smile. “Hi there.” Riley greeted. You stood mouth agape. Her blonde hair spiraled down to her chest while her makeup accentuated her face perfectly. “H…h….Hi.” Was all you could muster. She smiled at your awkwardness. “Why what a gentleman is that for me?” Riley motioned to the rose in your hand. “Yes, it is.” You blurted gawkily extending your hand to give it to her. “Thank you, kind sir.” Riley responded bending over to accept the rose. She leaned in to give you a kiss on the cheek and in the process gave you an eyeful of her cleavage. “Let me find a vase and some water to put it in. Come on in.” She said turning back into the house.

You swiftly stepped through the door and closed it behind you. Riley stood in the living room pondering. It seemed as though she was trying to remember where she had put her vase. From the doorway, you watched her admiringly. As you watched the 7’ Amazon, your mind wandered back to the dream. You imagined her at the incredible size that she was in that dream. Riley started to inch up right in front of your eyes! Her head inched closer to the ceiling. You didn’t intend to make her grow right now, but why stop a good thing. You concentrated harder on growing Riley. Her body responded promptly, increasing in height faster than before. She was already approaching the 8’ mark. Riley began to look irritated that she couldn’t remember where she had placed the vase. She tapped her stretching bare foot impatiently on the floor. “Where did I put it?” Riley pondered. Faster and faster she grew. Her body stretched and lengthened. The house was beginning to look too small for the giant girl. As you thought that, you felt a low rumble in the floor beneath your feet. You were astounded as Riley’s house began to grow in size as well. The house stretched in all directions to accommodate Riley’s growing stature as she surpassed the 10’ mark.

“Ah ha! I know where it is!” Riley exclaimed snapping her fingers. She elegantly walked into the kitchen but you continued to focus on her growth. You pictured her still growing taller. Although you couldn’t see her, you knew it was still working due to her house still changing its size as well. Out of the corner of your eye, you noticed her shoes that she was going to wear out tonight. They were a pair of black ballet flats that were increasing in size as well! It was odd watching the shoes stretch longer to fit Riley’s growing feet. You figured all of her clothing had to be custom made for sure. Suddenly your concentration on the shoes was broken when Riley walked back into the room carrying the rose in the vase. “There we are. I will put it right here for now. So I can see it every day.” She explained placing it on the coffee table.

You figured now it was time to stop her growth. You still wanted her to enjoy the date you had planned and not be too big for it. Riley’s growth stopped at a staggering 14’ tall. She was now double the height of what you had grown her to yesterday. Riley was an absolute Goddess. Her legs were now longer than your entire body! You stared in awe at your handiwork. Riley looked down at you adoringly. She walked right up to you, giving you a true sense of her new size. Gracefully, Riley bent down and put on the shoes that you were admiring as they grew. As she stood back up to her full height she gave you another kiss on the cheek along the way. “Okay, I am ready.” Riley announced happily. You turned around to see the door had changed as well. There were now two doorknobs on it, one for average size and one for Riley’s size. She reached over you and turned the knob meant for her. As you walked outside and Riley followed, you thought to yourself, this is going to be one incredible night!

The maître d’ appeared once again in front of you…
