You finally decided to end their growth after a few more inches at an astounding 10’6” tall. They were 150% larger than they were moments ago. “Well, I should probably be heading off. I’ve got quite a few errands to take care of today.” Riley admitted. “Alright Riley, we will see you to the door,” Teresa stated. This was your cue. You bolted over two the now 12’ high front door and watched eagerly as the two giants rose slowly. Your jaw dropped to the floor when the girls stood to their full height. Their hips were nearly at your eye level! Riley’s massive orbs loomed over your head.

“Bye Teresa. I will see you later.” Riley turned to hug her equally tall counterpart. Then she turned back to you. “See ya later little bro!” Riley said enthusiastically. She wrapped you in a giant bear hug. Her body surrounded yours and it felt amazing. Teresa reached around the hug and opened the front door for her best friend. Riley released you from the embrace and you watched her walk down the front steps and down the street. “Come on buddy, it’s your turn to clean the house.” Teresa insisted as she walked up to her room. Yeah right, like you were going to do that while you had these incredible powers. What were you going to do next?
15512121.title: You want Riley and Teresa grow even more!

choices: Why not make Riley even bigger!
Make more women grow so Riley isn't a giant lab rat.
155121211.content:
Out of the corner of your eye, you caught one last glimpse of Riley walking away down the street. The image of the enormous Riley from your dreams flashed in your mind once more. It was great that she was more than double her original size now, but you wanted to make your vision a reality. You looked around the dirty house and all the chores you had to do. “Screw this.” You said aloud. Before your now bigger sister came back and gave you shit, you quickly put your shoes on and headed out the front door after Riley. As you were slamming the door behind you, you swore you heard Teresa’s voice calling out for you. Phew. Dodged getting chewed out and stuck with chores by that much.

Your eyes adjusted to the brightness of the midday sun and you scanned the direction that Riley went in. Thanks to her new stature, you were able to identify her in the distance fairly easily. Swiftly you jogged down the street after Riley. With her new longer legs, she covered distance a lot faster than she used to. By the time you got to within 20 feet of her, you were well out of breath. You slowed your pace to match Riley’s and catch your breath. “I have to go back to the gym.” You muttered quietly. The 10’6” Riley turned around and saw you nearly doubled over. She stopped walking. “Hey ‘little’ guy. You stalking me now?” She teased. You stopped in front of Riley. “No of course not. I figured you might want an escort. You know to make sure you get home safely?” You suggested. Riley laughed, “I’m over 10 feet tall and it is the middle of the day. I think I can manage.” You laughed as well. “I guess so. How about someone to keep you company then?” You proposed. “Yeah, I’d like that.” Riley smiled.

The two of you continued on walking toward Riley’s place, turning left to cut through a large park as a shortcut. This was the perfect place to grow Riley. You were able to breathe like a normal person once again, but it was still a good effort to keep up with Riley’s longer strides. She flashed you another beaming smile looking down at you. “So tell me about your new job.” You said looking for a distraction while you focused on making her grow. “Well, I am enjoying it so far. Apparently, I am saving the company money in changing light bulbs and smoke detectors.” Riley laughed. You had already started the process of growth and this was going to be the biggest one yet! You pictured Riley the size that she was when she appeared in your dream. Her body skyrocketed into the clear blue sky. She was growing several feet a second. Riley continued on talking about her new employment but you were barely listening. You were too busy appreciating the incredible growth spurt she was going through.

Already Riley had doubled in size again and continued to surge upward. Out of the corner of your eye, you noticed her shoes were vanishing into thin air. She continued to walk on barefoot. At her size, there must have been no point in wearing footwear. Riley’s clothes changed as well. It looked like she had to buy industrial size material to fashion into outfits for herself. Her enormous breasts looked barely contained by her new top. Riley’s blonde hair shone in the sun, as she grew closer to 40’ tall. She walked a lot slower now so that you could somewhat keep up with her. “At least the lab is kindly offering to take care of my basic needs such as food and clothing while they continue their tests on me.” Riley continued on with her story, which had entirely changed. “Have they figured out how it happened yet?” You yelled. “Hmm, what did you say? Sorry, I can’t hear you so well down there. Here let’s try this.” Riley said.

She stopped in her tracks and bent down over to you, placing her hands out for you to get on. Still, you continued on with her growth. “Do you trust me?” She asked. You did your best to hide your excitement. “Yeah of course.” You responded. Carefully you stepped onto her palms and gently sat down. Riley smiled at you as she rose her hands up to her face and stood back up. “Now what were you saying earlier?” She asked now in the neighborhood of 60’. You could feel her skin stretching underneath you. “I was wondering if the scientists were able to determine anything yet?” You restated. Riley sighed as she started to walk again, this time in full stride. “No, unfortunately. They say I have a hyperactive pituitary gland and it started at puberty, but still can’t explain for this incredible size.” Riley explained. Incredible. What an explanation the universe had attempted to create to accommodate the changes you had made to reality. “Well for the record, I think you look magnificent.” You declared. “Aww well, thanks little guy. I appreciate that.” Riley smiled.

Her face was now looking similar to the size it was in your dream, so you figured it was time to stop the growth. Riley now stood a remarkable 100’ tall now! And she was absolutely stunning. You admired the frame of the giant blonde goddess. “Well, here we are, my place. Or at least the place the lab has set up for me.” Riley said. You looked around. There was a giant airplane hangar with very large doors for Riley to crawl into. The two of you were way on the outskirts of town now. What would have taken you hours to walk, took Riley minutes with her mindboggling strides. “Thanks for the company. However, I am afraid you’re not exactly close to home. Wanna hang out with me today? I can take you home later?” Riley offered.

“Yeah, I’d like that.” You smiled. “Great.” She responded. Riley smiled back and leaned in to give you a giant kiss. Your entire body was enveloped in her lips. The feeling was extraordinary.

What will you two get up to?
155121211.title: The Giant Riley of your dreams

choices: It was your favorite cosplayer!
Your girlfriend!
Someone else.
1552.content:
(Just adding this for more options.)

You think and think, trying to remember who the women of your dream was, then you finally think you remembered!
1552.title: Your favorite cosplayer

choices: Damn the line for Casey is 3 hours long! Check elsewhere first.
You got there nice and early. Test out your powers on Casey Wolf!
15521.content:
It was fairly obvious from the outfit the giant woman in your dream was wearing who she was. The woman in question was your favorite cosplayer, Casey Wolffe. You looked over to the full-size poster of Casey on your far wall. She was wearing one of your favorite outfits that she had ever worn, Marvel’s Black Cat. There was no mistaking the eyes that were looking through the window at you were hers. Casey was one of the hottest cosplayers in the entire world! Of course, she would be a great choice to make gigantic.

When Casey wasn’t dressed up or in costume, she stood 5’11” tall with dark brown hair and impressive DD cup breasts. Once again you pictured Casey staring lustfully at you through your bedroom window. The idea of her being enormous made you stiff. That is when you noticed the ticket on your nightstand for Comic-Con. It was almost a weird sense of destiny that you would have that dream the night before you were going to Comic-Con. And of course, Casey was going to be there signing autographs. Was it meant to be?

You couldn't wait to get down to the convention center! You quickly showered, shaved, and got dressed. The thought of wearing a costume had crossed your mind, but you didn’t want to be ‘too’ nerdy at the Comic-Con, especially if you were going to meet Casey for the first time ever. You grabbed a piece of toast on your way out the door and jumped into your car.

'Casey I am on my way!' you thought to yourself.
15521.title: Favorite Cosplayer!?

choices: She and the team were in the gymnasium practicing for tonight's game
You had English class first thing this morning. She would be there
You accidentally bump into her in the hallway, making her drop her books
1553.content:
You finally clued into who the gigantic woman was in your dream. It was none other than Jess, the 6’6” captain of the women’s basketball team at the college you went to. After thinking about it for a moment, it all kind of made sense too. Why wouldn’t your subconscious picture the tallest girl in school, as a giantess? Jess was the MVP of the division. She was first in points, rebounds, blocks, and assists. They were definitely going all the way to the championship this year. Not only was Jess an impressive player, she was quite beautiful too. She had long, light brown hair with blue eyes. She also had the greatest smile that you had ever seen. The great thing was that Jess loved being that tall! She always loved wearing heels to add more inches to her incredible height.

Jess was becoming somewhat of a celebrity around campus, as scouts were pegging her to be the number one pick in this year’s WNBA draft. She never let it get to her head though. Jess was always quite down to earth and friendly to everyone she met. The two of you didn’t really talk much but you did share one English class together. You went to many of the games, of course, to cheer on the team, but also watch the captain at work. You supposed that you had always had a little bit of a crush on Jess, but you never had the courage to go up and talk to her.

You pictured her enormous face smiling at you through the bedroom window. Could you really alter reality to change people’s height? You had to find out right away. You got up and showered and got dressed as quickly as you could. It was clear that you were on a mission as you headed out the door. You had to find Jess. But where was she at this time of day?
1553.title: Jess, the captain of the Women's Basketball team

choices: Make Jess grow taller of course!
Make Jess the shortest on the team. Grow her teammates.
15531.content:
You got out of bed and opened your phone to check your class schedule. Unfortunately, you did not have English today, so you wouldn’t find Jess there. Then you had a look at the campus calendar on your wall and noticed that both the men and women’s basketball teams played host tonight to the school’s rival team. Excellent, that would mean that the girls were probably in the gym practicing for tonight’s big game. Jess would definitely be there. You looked around your dorm room for some clean-ish clothes to wear before quickly hopping into the shower. Luckily you didn’t have any classes today so you didn’t have anywhere else to be.

After about 10 minutes or so, you left your dorm and casually made your way across campus toward the sports complex. As you walked down the path you noticed a couple of cute girls sitting on a bench, chatting away about whatever. You weren’t really paying attention. The idea of making the girls grow did cross your mind but you carried on. Your objective was in the gym. A couple more minutes passed and you entered the athletics building. Down the halls, you walked by the swimming pools and the track course before you found yourself entering the main gymnasium. To your dismay, the men’s team was still on the court running drills. On the far sidelines though you recognized a couple of Jess’s teammates stretching and warming up. They must be on after the guys. Might as well go sit in the stands and wait.

You walked around the perimeter of the court, avoiding the chaos of the men running lines, and made your way toward the bleachers. There were a few people watching from the seats but they were pretty spread out. It looked as though a couple of them may have been scouts but you couldn’t be sure. You casually took a seat in the second row to be close, but not too close of course for when the women came out. Scanning the far end once again, you saw a few more players on the sideline but still no Jess. This was starting to irritate you. Where could she be? The men’s coach blew the whistle and called everyone over to the bench. Oh good, you thought, looks like they are finally finishing up.

After another five minutes, the coach ended his huddle and the guys began to leave the gym. The women started making their way out on to the court, each dribbling a basketball. Calmly you searched for Jess. In almost dramatic style, Jess finally appeared; the last to step onto the court. You did your best to act normal and not stare while the women walked out, but it was difficult. The 6’6” star walked proudly across the court toward the home bench. Jess wore her long brown hair in a bun so it wouldn’t get in her face. She wore the same ensemble as the rest of her team, tear away pants and a long sleeve warm-up shirt. Jess looked over at you sitting in the stands and for a brief moment, you made eye contact. You nonchalantly looked elsewhere to avoid suspicion. It was clear that she recognized you, but didn’t acknowledge you in any way.

As she got to the bench, Jess placed down her backpack on a chair, then proceeded to rip off her breakaway pants. Her long, elegant, yet powerful legs stole all of your attention. You wanted to test out if your powers from the dream actually worked. But how would you do it?
15531.title: Practicing in the gym

choices: Grow Jess more for the big game!
Help out Dana and make her grow too. Twin Towers!
155311.content:
Jess was the one that you had seen in your dream, so of course, you were going to attempt to make her grow first. You admired her impressive size and physique from afar as she started shooting some baskets on your side of the court. As she worked on her three-point shot, you began to wonder how you could make her grow exactly. The dream was a bit stingy on how to use your new powers. Was it a verbal command? Or did you have to point your hands like you were casting a spell? Too deep in thought, you didn’t notice Jess’s shot ricochet off the rim and head straight in your direction. “Head’s up!” She yelled.

You snapped out of it quickly but it was no use. The ball struck you pretty hard in the arm. “Oww fuck.” You muttered under your breath as you massaged your arm. Apparently, the entire team had watched this happen, and they all began to laugh at you. Jess did her best not to laugh as she made her way over to you. “You okay?” She asked. “Yeah, I am alright. My fault for not paying attention.” You replied laughing. Jess smiled awkwardly as the silence between you grew. You dumbfoundedly stared back at her. “Uh, a little help?” She asked motioning to the ball in your lap. “Oh right. Sorry about that.” You apologized passing the ball back to her. “Thanks.” She responded as she headed back to the court. You heard a few girls snicker around you. Your face turned bright red in embarrassment.

The girls went into working defensive drills with the coaches. Jess was guarding against the redhead Dana, the next tallest girl on the team at 6’1”. It looked as though Dana had quite the challenge trying to get around her taller teammate. You wanted it to be even more difficult for her. You pictured Jess growing taller in the middle of the play. Amongst the frenzy, you swore that you noticed Jess looked even taller next to Dana. No one else seemed to notice this but you. Jess didn’t even seem to stumble as she moved. If you had to guess, Jess looked like she gained two more inches and was about 6’8”. You wanted her to get even bigger though. Once again you focused on Jess being taller. Her body stretched higher as Dana received a pass from another teammate. She quickly turned to take a shot, but was easily stuffed by the incredibly long arms of the now taller Jess! Her team cheered for her impressive block.

Jess was now 7’ tall! This was amazing. You made her 6” taller than she was original. The interesting thing though was no one seemed to be freaked out by this. Also, her clothes still looked normal on her body and not shrunken. Perhaps when you made changes, reality transformed as well to reflect what you had done. You pulled out your phone and looked at the team’s roster to confirm your theory. Sure enough, Jess’s stats listed her as being 7’ tall! Incredible. The lineups traded places and now Jess was on offense. Dana looked more winded now facing her now taller colleague. Quickly you focused on growing Jess again. She shot up abruptly another 6” as the ball was thrown to her. The 7’6” Jess aggressively headed for the basket, knocking Dana over, as she went for an impressive slam dunk that she made look effortless. Everyone in the building cheered her on. Still being a good teammate, Jess turned around to Dana and offered a hand to help her up. Dana's smaller hand reached up and Jess lifted the girl easily to her feet. The girls got back into formation to run the play again.

The star player was a real standout now that she was a full foot taller than she was moments ago. Your mind raced with ideas. What should you do next?
155311.title: Slam dunk? No problem now!

choices: Come on Jess was the one in your dream. Make her gigantic!
Make the whole team unstoppable with growth!
Make Dana the tallest. Let Jess feel second best.
1553112.content:
As the girls finished up the drill, the coach blew the whistle for everyone to take a water break. Your eyes followed Jess as she walked casually over to the bench. As Jess passed the slower walking Dana, she gave her a pat on the back and continued ahead of her. Your attention stayed with Dana though. She looked really dejected. She was probably grateful to have Jess on her side, but at the same time, it looked as though as there was some jealousy as well. You figured that probably throughout most of her playing career she was the tallest. In both middle school and high school, Dana was probably the dominant one on the court. No one came close to her size. Then she comes here where she is outshined by the mind-blowingly tall 7’6” Captain, who dwarfed everyone. You almost began to feel a bit sympathetic toward Dana.

Once again the coach blew the whistle and the players made their way back onto the court. Dana reluctantly made her way back to her position guarding Jess. You figured it had to be pretty humbling for her to meet someone that was bigger and more talented than her. Sometimes that is unfortunately just part of life. But hold on, you could change reality now. Why not make her taller as well? Then she and Jess could be the dominant duo on the basketball court. The 6’1” redhead lined up yet again guarding against Jess. You figured this as good a time as any to start making Dana taller. The play started and you focused on the redhead inching up. It was clear that she was already a good few inches higher than she originally was, as she attempted to box out Jess from getting a rebound. Of course, she was still inadequate in stopping Jess, but she seemed more determined than before to succeed.

Dana was now 6’7”, above Jess’s original height and still growing. It was fairly obvious that Jess has having a more difficult time getting around the growing Dana. Jess was still making her baskets, but they were not coming to her as easy as they usually did. You figured making Dana bigger was beneficial to both girls as they now had stronger competition in each other. The look of frustration and dejection were completely gone from Dana’s face now as she surpassed 7’. She was all smiles now, being able to go toe to toe with Jess. Looking around, it seemed like the number of scouts in the crowd had doubled. The news of two female basketball players over 7’ tall was more widespread than news of just one. Dana was now closing in on Jess’s height.

You decided to end Dana’s growth at 7’6”, even in height with Jess. The two gigantic girls looked to be in an entirely different league from the rest of the team. It was like adults playing alongside 10-year olds. At that very moment, Jess got the ball and dribbled in for a layup. Dana moved with her step for step. As Jess went up to dunk, she was met with the sound of a loud leathery slap as Dana stuffed Jess’s attempt. The entire crowd hounded Jess. Dana’s teammates cheered her on. Jess looked absolutely livid with what just happened. She seemed even more driven to play against the tall redhead.

What happens next?
1553112.title: Dana joins in the fun. Twin towers of the court

choices: Later at the big game tonight!
Use your powers on the women's volleyball team
You decided to mismatch the height of the twins.
15531122.content:
You examined the eight other girls on the team with Jess and Dana. An intriguing idea surfaced in your brain. With two very tall players, they were a force to be reckoned with, but what if the entire team was gigantic? Then they would be utterly unstoppable! The girls were hustling running drills while their coaches watched closely, critiquing their performance. Apart from the team’s two stars, the coaches appeared frustrated with the effort from their players. The other girls must have thought, why bother when you can rely on Jess and Dana to carry the team? If they were all tall, then each girl would have more drive to compete with each other. This idea was too perfect to pass up. There was no changing your mind now. It was time to make the entire team grow. You figured that increasing their size by 25% was a good start. You focused on the other athletes growing taller. Immediately their bodies responded to your telepathic command. They began to ascend higher. As the girls started to get taller, the intensity level of the practice appeared to increase.

First, there were two shortest players on the team. They were the starting guards 5'4" Claire and 5'5" Molly. They may have been the smallest, but they were fast and quick at passing the ball. The already extra few inches were looking good on them you thought to yourself. Next, there were the second line guards 5'6" Addison and Ava. They were identical twin sisters. A part of you thought it would be hilarious to make on twin sister grow more than the other. Maybe you would experiment in that department later on. The other four girls were the forwards alongside Jess and Dana. There was 5'7" Miko, 5'8" Tori, 5'10" Reagan, and finally 5'11" Bailey. All the girls were steadily stretching upward to join their taller teammates Jess and Dana. Of course, Bailey and Reagan were already above 6 feet tall and showed no signs of slowing down. The shorter girls were quickly approaching the same mark. Soon there would be no players shorter than you. You picture yourself standing in the middle of a team huddle with the girls. They were all looming over you. You could feel yourself getting hard in your pants just thinking about it. Before you got caught up in your daydream, you turned your focus back to the court to enjoy the girls' ascension.

Claire finally crossed the 6-foot threshold, making the entire team officially taller than you. Molly, Addison, and Ava were looking incredible as well standing over 6 feet. You weren't sure why, but something about the twins growing taller was especially arousing. Perhaps the idea of genetics creating two perfect Amazonian duplicates was a sign of divine intervention. The rest of the girls were around the 6 and a half feet to 7-foot range. Miko was destroying all the Asian stereotypes. She was now standing a mountainous 6'6" tall and still growing! The entire team was engaged in the practice now. Everyone was competing with each other, trying to prove themselves and get noticed by the scouts. Even Jess and Dana were hustling more from when it was the two of them that were taller. Reagan easily deked around Tori and drove to the basket for the one-handed slam dunk. That provoked a loud cheer from the attentive crowd watching. Tori was visibly frustrated with herself for falling for that obvious deke. She was charged to show up Reagan on the next play. She received the ball again. This time as she made her move, Tori swatted the ball out of her hands. Tori lost her balance and fell to the floor. Another cheer arose from the crowd. Still being a good teammate, Tori helped lift the taller Reagan back onto her feet.

The girls were nearing the end of their 25% increase in size. Bailey was closely approaching Jess and Dana's size. She wouldn't be the same height as them, but she was very close. That gave you another exciting idea. You decided to give Jess and Dana a boost as well. You didn't want to grant them a full 25% increase as well. They would be nearly hitting their heads on the hoop. You decided to grow them 25% of their original height, just like everyone else was. Their growth wouldn't be as significant, but they'd still be the tallest on the team. Also, you decided to keep Dana at the same size as Jess. You loved the idea of them being the twin towers of the court. Slowly their heads began to rise alongside their teammates. Looking over at the coaches, you could see they were ecstatic with the work ethic of their players. They had won the lottery when it came to being rewarded with so many tall players on one team. Their third championship in a row was so close that they could almost taste it. They were hungry for another title, and no one was going to stand in their way.

The practice was coming to an end. So was the girls' growth. They were now all 25% taller than their original height. Except for Dana, she got a little extra to stay on par with Jess. The point guards Claire and Molly were 6'8" and 6'9" respectively. The twins Addison and Ava were 6'10.5". Miko was 6'11", Tori was 7'1", Reagan was 7'3.5", and Bailey was 7'5"! Finally, there was Dana and Jess. They were both 25% taller than Jess's original height of 6'6", making them an incredible 8'1" tall! They were enormous. Their starting point guard was as tall as the tallest guy on the men's team! They were truly Amazonian in size now. The girls also seemed fitter as well. They had a muscular physique, yet still had very feminine curves at the same time. Every single woman on the team was simply stunning! They looked like Greek Goddesses taken right out of the pages of mythology. You could feel your throbbing cock pressing tightly against your pants. The coach blew the whistle as the practice came to an end. The girls gathered one final time for a quick lecture from the coach. He was brief, saving the inspirational speech for just before game time. The team grabbed some water and headed for the locker room to shower. These powers were incredible! You could barely contain yourself as you wanted to test them out more!
15531122.title: An entire team of Amazonian basketball players

choices: Physical touch allows others to see your changes.
You somehow accidentally transferred your powers to Jess!
Kendall, Jess, and Dana all start growing out of your control
15531123.content:
As you watched Jess and Dana go head to head on the court, a devilish thought emerged in your brain. All of her life, Jess was always the tallest and most dominant player in women's basketball. That is until you grew Dana to be the same size as Jess. The equivalent went for Dana she always played in Jess's shadow. She never got the credit for her contribution to the team. Dana presumably worked her entire life to be the best possible player that she could be. Well, what if you made it so that Dana was the tallest and best player on the team? Perhaps it was someone else's turn to stand in the spotlight, be the envy of the entire league. Better yet, why not shrink Jess back down to size and add that height to Dana? Then there would be no disputing that Dana was the actual star of the team. Your plan was so intoxicating you could not wait any longer to execute it. The girls were on the far side of the court, grabbing another drink of water. Jess and Dana were standing beside each other catching their breath. You zeroed in on the two of them and pictured their sizes adjusting.

Jess began to dwindle gradually in front of your eyes. At the same time, Dana was slowly inching upward, increasing the size gap between them. It was unbelievable seeing it all unfold in real time. Jess was nearing the 7-foot mark while the redhead was pushing on toward 8 feet! You had never witnessed any woman taller than Jess before. It was surreal that she was no longer the tallest on the team. Out of the corner of your eye, you spotted the MVP banners on the wall transforming. Jess' name disappeared and was replaced by Dana's. New memories formed in your head of Dana being the one leading the team to two straight championships. They'd soon going for a third consecutive title. As the size disparity greatened, you noticed a change in both girls' demeanor. Jess appeared to be more anxious around her taller teammate. She was jealous of Dana and not getting any of the credit for her contributions to the team. Meanwhile, Dana, on the other hand, was loving being the star. Every single WNBA and NBA team was there to scout her!

Dana was the most sought after prospect in the history of the game. Everyone knew about the incredible 8'3"...no...8'5" female basketball player. Meanwhile, Jess was nearing her original height of 6'6". You had a new idea pop into your head to make Jess even shorter than she initially was and give some extra height to Dana. The former star of the team was now 6'4" and still shrinking. You didn't want to be too cruel and shrink her down below 6 feet. Slowly Jess's dwindling came to a stop at 6'1", Dana's former size. You took the extra 5 inches and attributed them to the behemoth redhead. Dana now stood an astounding 8'11" tall! Nearly 3 feet taller than Jess. The former captain of the team barely came up to Dana's breasts now. It was useless for Jess to attempt to defend against Dana. She approximately had almost 300 lbs. on her teammate. The coach blew the whistle one final time to end the practice. Not before Dana decided to put on a show for her scouts and slammed a massive dunk that received cheers from everybody. Dana's hip clipped Jess, knocking her flat on her ass. There were a few laughs from the crowd. You sincerely felt bad for her though. After her dunk, Dana walked over to Jess and offered her hand to help her up. It pained Jess to accept Dana help, but she willingly stretched out her arm and reached for Dana's hand. Dana boosted Jess up like she weighed nothing. The two teammates walked over to the huddle, where the coach talked about the big game tonight.

After a few moments of motivating the team, the coach dismissed the players. They began to go their separate ways. Of course, everyone crowded Dana to get her autograph, talk about contracts, etc. You, however, kept your eyes on Jess. She had been the one in your unbelievable dream and the reason you were here. Jess quickly grabbed her gear and made her way for the door. Immediately you chose to follow her. You jumped off the bleachers and ran after her. You opened the door to the hallway and spotted her about 15 steps ahead. Casually you walked behind her to avoid looking like you were stalking her. Once you were close enough, you called out to Jess. "Hey! Awesome practice out there today." You announced. Jess halted in her tracks and let out a heavy sigh. She turned around to you. "Thanks," Jess responded sarcastically. "No, really I mean it!" You insisted as you got close to her. It was surreal to be looking almost eye to eye with Jess now. Then she appeared to recognize you. "Oh hey, sorry about that ball hitting you. It was an accident." Jess apologized weakly. "Don't worry about that. I wasn't paying attention when I should have been." You responded.

"May I walk with you?" You asked. "It's a free country I suppose." Jess sighed. She resumed walking toward the building's exit while you tagged along with her. It was eerie that Jess only an inch taller than you rather than half a foot taller. Of course, to her, this was the norm. Jess lived a life overshadowed by a woman on her team that was nearly 9 feet tall. She kept looking forward as she walked, barely even acknowledging you. Then her voice finally broke the silence. "Oh hey, sorry about that basketball hitting you earlier." Jess apologized. "Hey, it's okay. I should have been paying attention." You responded. Again there was silence. It was your turn to break the tension. "You excited for the big game tonight?" You asked. "Sure I guess." She answered dejectedly. "You don't sound very enthused." You stated. "It's kind of hard to be excited when you are playing with a freak show that hogs all the attention. Even if we do win, no one will notice me." Jess blurted. No one on the court or in the crowd except for you noticed the transformation happening. The referee finished his discussion at the scoring table and brought the ball to Claire to begin the 2nd quarter. She attempted to pass it to Jess, but immediately it was intercepted by Masha who easily drove in for a layup and scored two more points. 34-2. Jess had now crossed the 7-foot threshold, but there was still no change in the score of the game.

"What the hell is happening?" you thought to yourself. It didn't make any sense whatsoever. All you wanted to do was grow Jess so that her team could have the advantage over the Storm and win the game. Then, all of a sudden, Masha and Yulia were similarly growing. It didn't make any sense. You were only focusing your abilities on Jess. So how was Masha and Yulia benefiting from this as well? The Storm moved their way down the court with possession of the ball. Jess, now almost 7'2" went for a drastic skyhook to avoid the long reach of Masha. Luckily she was successful as the bounce favored her and went in. Those two points sparked a cry from the home crowd. They were hopelessly craving a reason to cheer for their team. Meanwhile, the 7'6" Yulia was dribbling down the court. Molly decided to try a different tactic. She quickly used her speed and stole the ball from the towering Yulia. The crowd went hysterical! Molly drove for the basket with the Russian was right behind her. As Molly went for the layup, Yulia swatted at the ball. Her hand made contact with Molly's arm as well. The ref quickly blew the whistle and called a foul on Yulia. The crowd cheered again along with the rest of Molly's teammates. Yulia was unquestionably unhappy with the call.

The two teams lined up around the key for Molly's free throws. Jess and the sisters were still slowly growing above everyone else. Molly took her first shot and made it. Her teammates high-fived her as the crowd roared. In between the two free throws, you noticed that all three girls had stopped growing. They were all precisely a foot taller than they were before. Jess was 7'6", Yulia was 7'10", and Masha was an incredible 7'11" tall! Molly took her second shot and made that one as well. 34-6. Just like that, the Storm had tripled their score. The crowd was now more engaged in the game now that they were scoring some points. As you watched the three towering ladies sprint down the court, you had an epiphany. You had a solid theory as to why the sisters grew along with Jess. Reality was making some amendments with the changes you were making. It was course-correcting to justify why the Heat had a 30 point lead on the Storm. If you made Jess gigantic, it would undo everything that had happened so far. There would be no reason the Heat would have such a dramatic lead if Jess towered over everyone. You theorized that it was easier for reality to modify what had happened rather than create a whole new one. It was all still quite confusing, but in a way, it made sense too.

Although the Heat still had quite the lead in the game, Jess and the Storm were making up ground. The smaller players like Claire, Molly, and Bailey were using their speed as an advantage. They were beating their opponents one on one and scoring baskets. Or if Yulia or Masha tried to double team them, they'd pass through the Russian girls' legs to Jess or Dana for the quick basket. Defending against the statuesque sisters was still difficult, but there was some success in prohibiting them scoring every time. The first half was coming to an end, and the Storm were steadily "storming" back. They went on a 19-12 run, bringing the score to 46-25. The last few seconds were ticking off the clock. Jess suddenly rushed to the three-point line and got the ball. She quickly spun and fired off a fadeaway shot just as the buzzer sounded. The entire gymnasium watched in silence as the ball arched through the air, and landed right in the net! The fans went ballistic for Jess's incredible three-point shot. 46-28! That was an incredible shot to end the 1st half of the game. Jess was energized, and so were her teammates. They all gathered around her for a big group hug. The rest of her team looked like children attempting to hug her hips and long legs.

The teams made their way back to their dressing rooms. This time, Jess did acknowledge you as she gave you a wink as she passed by. You smiled back at her grinningly. Although you hadn't meant to grow the Ivanov sisters alongside Jess, there had still been a definite shift in momentum. It was exciting watching three 7-foot plus women playing on the court, going head to head. And now the Heat only had an 18 point lead on the Storm. If the Storm kept this momentum going, they could undoubtedly catch up. One thing was for certain the second half was going to be exciting! Especially if you continued to use your powers you though devilishly to yourself.
155311231112.title: Masha and Yulia start growing too?!

info.brief_description: Women start growing, and the universe changes to suit them
info.description:
It's back! One of Kardo's original Interactive makes its return. Unfortunately, I could not find all of the chapters using the wayback machine. But there was enough to get a good starting point again. If anyone has any missing chapters in their archives please feel free to email them to me and I will add it. Of course, new chapters are welcome as well! My only request is no one sentence chapters. I will remove those. Also to keep in the spirit of the original Interactive, I've kept Kardo's rules too. Thanks and happy writing! - Named

You have been blessed with a power beyond imagining: The power to change the size of anything, and have everyone's memories and even the entire universe and everything in it change to make things seem as though they were always that way

Rules:

-No killing the main character

-No ending the story

-Please keep giantesses gentle

-Playful/Curious/Cute giantesses encouraged!

- No underage sex or nudity!

-No real celebrities.

- No cartoons/anime. Actual women please.

Ok, That is all. Have fun!
